mapper.select: SELECT f.account_id_from AS account_id_from, f.account_id_to AS account_id_to, f.account_id_to AS account_id, a.user_id AS user_id, a.user_name AS user_name, a.profile_photo_url AS profile_photo_url, f.status AS status FROM account a INNER JOIN friend f ON a.account_id = f.account_id_to WHERE f.account_id_from = #{id}
